text: IMOD can mean: *Interferometric modulator display - a Qualcomm display technology. *iPod - Apple iPod Modification *Kaavo imod - Cloud Computing Management Application by Kaavo *IMOD (software) - a set of programs used to visualize, reconstruct and segment microscopy images. *Ministry of Defense (Israel) - Israeli Ministry of Defense. == See also == * Imode (disambiguation)
title: IMOD
